basics.name: Lionel Derrick S. Roxas
basics.label: Computer Science - Data Science Student | Software Developer and Data Analyst
basics.summary: I'm a B.S. Computer Science student specializing in Data Science at the University of Hawaii at Manoa, with a passion for software development and data analytics. I graduate in November 2026.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

highlights: Master advanced AI and SWE techniques, including Neural Networks, Cloud-Native Architecture, and Autonomous Agents
Receive code reviews, DSA preparation, and industry panels to showcase scalable, algorithmic efficient, and production-ready applications
Develop cutting-edge solutions, including Churn Prediction Models, Real-Time Communication Systems, and Neural Network-Based Classifiers
Developing a real estate mobile application with Instagram-like features using React Native and Expo Go
Implementing backend services using FastAPI and PostgreSQL for efficient data management
Integrating Firebase for authentication and real-time features
Utilizing Android Studio for native platform optimization and testing
Collaborate with ICT Specialists to improve over 5 applications aimed at enhancing healthcare services and network management in the Pacific
Assisted in deploying applications for over 10,000 professionals operating in challenging conditions throughout the Pacific Region
Refactored Admin Portal website to develop CRUD logic on Firestore, Firebase Storage, and Firebase Authentication, increasing user base by 70%
Developed the Manoa Now mobile app, achieving over 1,500 downloads and boosting user retention rates by 25% on iOS and Android platforms
Use Xcode and Android Studio to ensure smooth app performance across iOS and Android, cutting update development time by 25%

volunteer.summary: Lead Software Developer of HEX Website
highlights: Full-stack development of HEX using React Native Expo for faster cross-platform development
Enhanced caching and query strategies for Firebase Storage and Firestore
Implemented reCAPTCHA v3 for enhanced security
Created CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions
Developed a centralized data hub for UH student organizations and businesses using Next.js and AWS
Implemented secure user authentication and data management with Firebase
Designed and optimized cloud infrastructure using AWS services
Created responsive and interactive user interfaces with Next.js and Tailwind CSS
Managed team collaboration through Git version control and agile methodologies
